channel.title: Golang - 标签 - Lucas's Blog
channel.description: 一个专注于区块链安全/密码学和开发工具的技术博客. | A technical blog focused on blockchain security, cryptography, and developer tools.

item.title: Golang安装
item.description:
依赖环境 Golang 安装(1.16.4):

wget -c https://studygolang.com/dl/golang/go1.16.4.linux-amd64.tar.gz -O - | sudo tar -xz -C /usr/local

# vim ~/.bashrc
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin
export GOPROXY=https://goproxy.cn
source ~/.bashrc
